title: FS: T206 reprint Honus Wagner. Includes a free certified autograph
author: Forza_azzurri

posts.post_title: FS: T206 reprint Honus Wagner. Includes a free certified autograph
posts.post_content:
This is a really cool piece, but my name is not Edward, so I won't be needing this.
$3500 net to me OBO.
Best,
John
[IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20210410/6e0e37ec2c2a78fbc55b306525d1e952.jpg[/IMG]

Sent from my SC-02H using Tapatalk
Could you legally change your name to Edward?  That would solve the problem. ;)

[quote name="bobsbbcards" post=2091397]Could you legally change your name to Edward?  That would solver the problem. ;)[/QUOTE]I guess if it costs less than $3500 to change my name to Edward, then it might make sense to do it.
